mapper.insert: insert into tb_sns(user_id, sns_title, sns_img, sns_content) values (#{user_id}, #{sns_title}, #{sns_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sns_content})
mapper.select: select a.sns_idx, a.sns_title, a.user_id, TO_CHAR(a.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, a.sns_likes, a.sns_views, b.user_nick, b.sns_img from tb_sns a, tb_user b where a.user_id = b.user_id order by a.sns_idx desc

select b.sns_idx, a.user_id, b.sns_title, b.sns_img, b.sns_content, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, b.sns_views, b.sns_likes, a.user_nick from tb_user a inner join tb_sns b on(a.user_id = b.user_id) where b.sns_idx=#{sns_idx}
mapper.update: update tb_sns set sns_views = sns_views + 1 where sns_idx = #{sns_idx}
